description: Having finished the job on location, repairmen Ryan Jordan and his partner Brian Adams decide they have enough time for a quickie, but when Johnny Hill and roomie Justin Matthews catch them, they realize their work load just doubled. Johnny and Justin waste no time testing their skills and Ryan and Brian prove that they're the right guys for this job. And even though the AC is freshly fixed, the temperature heats up quickly as the four of them fuck and suck until the job is done completely. Enjoy!
series: NDB - 4995 - Brian Adams, Ryan Jordan, Justin Matthews & Johnny Hill
title: Long Construction
